edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Andrew

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String choice
      This field holds the choice of the user.
      private GameEngine game
      This field instantiates the GameEngine
      private java.lang.String lookDir
      This field holds the direction chosen by the user to look.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserInterface()
      This constructor will build the UserInterface for use with GameEngine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mainMenu()
      This method will print the main menu of the game to the user and give options such as, "continue" or "new game".
      void printGrid()
      This method prints the Grid in its current state.
      void userAction()
      This method will give the user several options in terms of what can be done, the options are listed under choice.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • game

        private GameEngine game
        This field instantiates the GameEngine

      • choice

        private java.lang.String choice
        This field holds the choice of the user. There are 7 potential values for the user to select: left, right, up, down, shoot, save, exit

      • lookDir

        private java.lang.String lookDir
        This field holds the direction chosen by the user to look.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface()
        This constructor will build the UserInterface for use with GameEngine. Then it will check after each round whether or not the game has ended and print out the appropriate results.

    • Method Detail

      • mainMenu

        public void mainMenu()
        This method will print the main menu of the game to the user and give options such as, "continue" or "new game".

      • printGrid

        public void printGrid()
        This method prints the Grid in its current state. This will occur after every round. It will pull the Grid class from GameEngine.getGrid() and then call Grid.getfullGrid()

      • userAction

        public void userAction()
        This method will give the user several options in terms of what can be done, the options are listed under choice.
